title: MockREST – Create REST APIs from Your JSON Content
author: jventura
content: mockrestcreate rest apis your json content. api token (free) fully featured rest api's, create, update delete rows your json. automatic endpointsmockrest generates endpoints automatically your json objects. can access data using http verb such get, post, put delete. each creation, update deletion is automatically inserted your json, you then access your api backend.joão ventura © 2017
